author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-SoftBank Group unit Sprint and T-Mobile to combine
text:
April 30 (Reuters) - SoftBank Group Corp
* Says coâ€™s U.S.-based unit Sprint Corporation, and T-Mobile US, Inc. have entered into a definitive agreement to merge in an all-stock transaction at a fixed exchange ratio of 0.10256 T-Mobile shares for each Sprint share (or the equivalent of 9.75 Sprint shares for each T-Mobile share)
Source text in Japanese: goo.gl/AG9RHf
